marketNews.title: Bank Indonesia Estimates October 2025 Retail Sales Growth to be +4.3% YoY and +0.6% MoM, Driven by Majority Group Sales in Preparation for Christmas
marketNews.content: Bank Indonesia estimates retail sales in October 2025 will grow +4.3% YoY and +0.6% MoM, driven by sales in the majority of groups in line with increasing public demand ahead of Christmas preparations. In September 2025, retail sales were recorded at +3.7% YoY, although contracting -2.4% MoM (vs. August 2025: +3.5% YoY, +0.6% MoM), lower than Bank Indonesia's expectation which projected growth of +5.8% YoY and -0.3% MoM.

marketNews.title: Ministry of Trade Notes Processed Tin Exports from Indonesia in October 2025 Only Reached ~2,643 Tons
marketNews.content: The Ministry of Trade recorded that processed tin exports from Indonesia in October 2025 only reached ~2,643 tons (-53.9% YoY, -45.4% MoM).

marketNews.title: Director General at the Ministry of Industry Announces 24 Companies Contaminated with Radioactivity in Modern Cikande Industrial Estate, Banten
marketNews.content: Director General at the Ministry of Industry, Setia Diarta, on Monday (10/11) announced 24 companies contaminated with radioactivity in the Modern Cikande Industrial Estate, Banten. These companies come from various industries, including metal smelting, hazardous and toxic waste management, up to processed food companies using poultry raw materials Charoen Pokphand Indonesia ($CPIN) and PT Nikomas Gemilang which is a shoe factory for several global brands such as Nike, Adidas, and Puma. The number of companies exposed to radioactivity announced by the government is 2 companies more than the announcement last month. In October 2025, the government stated that there were 22 companies contaminated with Cesium-137 in the Modern Cikande Industrial Estate, but at that time the government had not announced the identity of each company. At the end of October 2025, $CPIN stated in a clarification to the IDX that the company and/or its business entities do not have production facilities in the Modern Cikande Industrial Estate that were included in the 22 factories affected by the radioactive decontamination process.

marketNews.title: Signal Besar dari Pergerakan Kecil Untuk IHSG
marketNews.content: "We can say, we are at the beginning - EM BULL CYCLE." - VarelJoanK

tickerNews.title: Pertamina Discusses Progress of Pelita Air Merger with Garuda Indonesia ($GIAA)
tickerNews.content: The President Director of Pertamina, Simon Aloysius Mantiri, stated on Monday (10/11) that the merger plan between Pelita Air and Garuda Indonesia ($GIAA) is still ongoing under the coordination of Pertamina and Danantara. Communication between Pertamina through Pelita Air and $GIAA has begun, with all processes to be reported to Danantara for decision making. For Pertamina, this merger process is part of a business portfolio restructuring strategy to strengthen the company's focus on its core business. Meanwhile, the CEO of Danantara, Rosan Roeslani, stated that although this corporate action plan is still under review, the merger aims to make the state-owned airlines' operations more efficient and productive by optimizing existing assets. Updates regarding the merger process between the two companies emerged amid a downward revision of potential funds raised from $GIAA's private placement to ~23.7 trillion rupiah, from the previous ~1.85 billion US dollars or 30.8 trillion rupiah assuming an exchange rate of 16,686 rupiah per US dollar. This decrease was caused by a lower planned cash capital injection from PT Danantara Asset Management, reducing from previously ~1.4 billion US dollars or ~24 trillion rupiah to 17 trillion rupiah, while the planned conversion of shareholder loans remained unchanged at 405 million US dollars or ~6.8 trillion rupiah. $GIAA also removed fleet expansion from the stated use of funds based on the new disclosure, but maintained the use of funds for working capital and company operations, working capital and Citilink operations, and repayment of Citilink fuel purchase debt. With this change in the private placement value, the dilution of public share ownership also changed from previously decreasing to 5.03% to 6.17%. Before this corporate action plan, the public shareholder portion in $GIAA was 27.47%. This plan will be discussed in the Extraordinary General Meeting of Shareholders (EGMS) on November 12, 2025. Previously, Danantara's COO, Dony Oskaria, told Bloomberg Technoz in October 2025 that Danantara would hold a rights issue for $GIAA after the company completed the private placement. This plan is intended to increase the public ownership portion diluted after the private placement.

tickerNews.title: $GOTO States No Agreement Reached with Grab
tickerNews.content: $GOTO: GoTo Gojek Tokopedia on Tuesday (11/11) stated in a clarification to the IDX that no agreement has been reached regarding potential transactions with Grab. $GOTO also mentioned that the EGMS to be held on December 17, 2025, is part of routine governance practices and is not related to any corporate action. In separate news, Bloomberg reported that a number of $GOTO shareholders - including SoftBank Group Corp., Provident Capital Partners, and Peak XV - are attempting to replace Patrick Walujo from his position as President Director to pave the way for a transaction with Grab. Bloomberg stated that Patrick, SoftBank, Peak XV, and Grab declined to comment on the issue, while Provident has not responded to requests for comment.

tickerNews.title: $ITMG Posts $40 Million Net Profit in 3Q25 on Improved Gross Margin, But 9M25 YTD Profit Misses Expectations
tickerNews.content: $ITMG: Indo Tambangraya Megah recorded a net profit of 40 million US dollars in 3Q25 (+52% QoQ, -72% YoY). This result brought the net profit for 9M25 to 131 million US dollars (-52% YoY), below expectations as it represents only 56% of the 2025F consensus estimate (vs. 2-year average: 77% annual realization). The quarterly net profit growth in 3Q25 was supported by gross profit margin expansion to 22.7% (+229 bps QoQ) following a decrease in cash cost per ton (-6% QoQ) and a stripping ratio to 9.3x (vs. 2Q25: 9.8x). Revenue in 3Q25 increased +3% QoQ due to a rise in sales volume (+7% QoQ), despite the average selling price dropping -4% QoQ. For 9M25, net profit was still pressured by the weakening average selling price to 77 US dollars per ton (-21% YoY), causing the gross profit margin for 9M25 to drop to 23.9% (-505 bps YoY). Revenue for 9M25 itself fell to 1.4 billion US dollars (-17% YoY), below expectations as it only equals 68% of the 2025F consensus estimate (vs. 2-year average: 74% annual realization).

tickerNews.title: $ASII October 2025 Car Wholesales Down 20% YoY at 34.9 Thousand Units; 10M25 Market Share Drops to 52.3%
tickerNews.content: $ASII: Astra International recorded car wholesales of 34.9 thousand units in October 2025 (-20% YoY, +4% MoM), with ASII's two main brands - namely Toyota+Lexus and Daihatsu - experiencing a wholesale decline of -24% YoY and -16% YoY, respectively. This result brought $ASII's car wholesales for 10M25 to 332.4 thousand units (-17% YoY), with market share dropping to 52.3% (vs. 10M24: 56.5%).

tickerNews.title: Directors and Commissioners of $MAPB Divest ~7.1 Million Shares for ~11.4 Billion Rupiah
tickerNews.content: $MAPB: Several directors and commissioners of Map Boga Adiperkasa - namely, Virendra Prakash Sharma, Jap Janti Kusuma Jaya, Liryawati, Anthony Valentine McEvoy, and Susiana Latif - sold a total of ~7.1 million $MAPB shares at a price of 1,600 rupiah per share on November 5, 2025. The total transaction value reached ~11.4 billion rupiah. After these transactions, their respective ownership portions dropped to 0% (none). This transaction was intended for divestment.

tickerNews.title: $SCMA to Distribute Interim Dividend of ~571.2 Billion Rupiah for 2025 Fiscal Year
tickerNews.content: $SCMA: Surya Citra Media will distribute an interim dividend for the 2025 fiscal year amounting to ~571.2 billion rupiah or 9 rupiah per share, indicating a dividend yield of ~2.5% as of Tuesday (11/11). The cum-dividend date in the regular and negotiation market is November 18, 2025, while the payment date is December 9, 2025.

tickerNews.title: $UNTR Revises Komatsu Heavy Equipment Sales Target Down to 4,500 Units for 2025, Citing Lower Coal Sector Demand
tickerNews.content: $UNTR: United Tractors Corporate Secretary, Ari Setiyawan, stated that the company is revising down the 2025 sales target for Komatsu brand heavy equipment from 4,600 units to 4,500 units. If achieved, this new target implies a growth of +1.8% YoY compared to the realization in 2024. Ari explained that the downward revision of the target considers lower sales of heavy equipment to the mining and forestry sectors than initially targeted, as national coal production realization this year is projected to slow down, and the need for heavy equipment in the forestry sector - especially in Sumatra - is relatively fulfilled. During 9M25, $UNTR recorded sales of Komatsu brand heavy equipment at 3,653 units (+10% YoY), supported by carry-over sales from last year, with market share dropping to 22% (vs. 9M24: 27%).

tickerNews.title: Shareholder of $PJHB Purchases 9.5 Million Shares, Increasing Direct Ownership to 5%
tickerNews.content: $PJHB: Pelayaran Jaya Hidup Baru shareholder, John Veter Firdaus, purchased 9.5 million $PJHB shares at an average price of 1,000 rupiah per share on November 10, 2025, which is about +56.3% higher than the stock price of $PJHB at the market close on the same day. The total transaction value reached 9.5 billion rupiah. After this transaction, John Veter Firdaus' direct ownership portion in $PJHB increased from 4.51% to 5%.

tickerNews.title: FUTURA Energy ($FUTR) Appoints New President Director and Commissioners; Geothermal Exploration Re-activation Planned for 1Q26
tickerNews.content: Futura Energi Global ($FUTR) shareholders on Monday (10/11) approved the appointment of Anggara Suryawan as President Director, replacing Tonny Agus Mulyantono. Meanwhile, retired Police General Sutanto was appointed as President Commissioner and Harry Maryanto Supoyo as Commissioner. Anggara stated that they will begin the re-activation of geothermal exploration in 1Q26, where initial exploration will start with developing a 30 MW capacity in Purwokerto, Central Java, with an estimated investment reaching 120 million US dollars. Drilling is targeted to start by the end of next year, after feasibility studies and technical preparations are completed. $FUTR will also execute a floating solar power plant (PLTS) project in the Nusa Dua Lake area, Bali, which is planned to start operating in 2Q26.

tickerNews.title: Pyridam Farma ($PYFA) Reportedly Bids to Acquire Mayne Pharma's Adelaide Production Facility
tickerNews.content: The Australian reported that Pyridam Farma ($PYFA) has submitted an offer to acquire the drug production facility in Adelaide, South Australia, owned by Mayne Pharma (ASX: MYX), although further details regarding the offer specifics, including the bid value, were not disclosed. Besides $PYFA, The Australian reported that several private equity firms such as Genesis Capital and Anchorage Capital Partners are also interested in the asset. Sources for The Australian stated that part of the asset's appeal is its land value, estimated to be around half of the total offer value.

tickerNews.title: Ancara Logistics Indonesia ($ALII) Commissioner Buys 2.1 Million Shares, Increasing Direct Ownership to 2.23%
tickerNews.content: Ancara Logistics Indonesia ($ALII) President Commissioner, Nalinkant Amratlal Rathod, purchased 2.1 million $ALII shares at an average price of 555 rupiah per share on November 5, 2025. The total transaction value reached ~1.2 billion rupiah. After this transaction, Nalinkant Amratlal Rathod's direct ownership portion in $ALII increased from 2.21% to 2.23%.
